shortdescription:
In this 1.5-hour workshop, you will learn to use your body as a conduit for giving and receiving vibrations through chanting various traditional South Indian mantras, slokas, stotrams, and sutras. You will learn mechanics of voice control and refine diaphragmatic breathing and Sanskrit pronunciations. Victoria McLellan is a classically trained singer with a deep love for chanting.
Join us and experience firsthand Victoria's decades of deep knowledge and inspiring presence!
The cost of participation in the workshop is 30 EUR. You can register for the event at our reception by paying the participation fee
